scripts.dev: bun webdev & bun --cwd server dev && fg
scripts.branch: git checkout main && git pull && git branch -D $(whoami) ; git checkout -b $(whoami)
scripts.pages: ENV=production bun --cwd web bbuild && rm -r ./docs && mkdir docs && cp -r ./web/dist/* ./docs/ && git restore docs/CNAME
scripts.ship: bun pages && git add . && git commit -m 'ship' && git push
